name: O2 Secure Wireless
overview: O2 Secure Wireless, Inc. engages in the development of various wireless tower facilities in the United States. It also engages in developing wireless broadband communication services. The company, through its subsidiary, Earthcom Service Inc., focuses on providing flat rate pre-paid wireless services in developing countries internationally. O2 Secure Wireless, Inc. was founded in 2003 and is based in St. Augustine, Florida.

funding_rounds.source_description: O2 SECURE WIRELESS RECEIVES $50 MILLION RESERVE EQUITY FINANCING FROM AGS CAPITAL GROUP, LLC FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF ITS BUILDING PROJECTS DOMESTIC AND ABROAD

milestones.description: O2 Secure Wireless, Inc. Announces Return of 500 Million Common Shares of OTOW to the Treasury
milestones.source_description: O2 Secure Wireless, Inc. Announces Return of 500 Million Common Shares of OTOW to the Treasury
